priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire RAND Social Support Survey Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C135700

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire RAND Social Support Survey Test Code Terminology

definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument test code.
name: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire RAND Social Support Survey Test Code Terminology
synonyms: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone you can count on to listen to you when you need to talk.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Count on to Listen to You
synonyms: RSSS01-Count on to Listen to You

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to give you information to help you understand a situation.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Give You Info to Help Understand
synonyms: RSSS01-Give You Info to Help Understand

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to give you good advice about a crisis.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Give You Advice About a Crisis
synonyms: RSSS01-Give You Advice About a Crisis

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to confide in or talk to about yourself or your problems.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Confide in or Talk to About Yourself

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone whose advice you really want.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Advice You Really Want

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to share your most private worries and fears with.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Share Your Private Worries and Fears

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to turn to for suggestions about how to deal with a personal problem.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Suggestions to Deal With Personal Problem

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone who understands your problems.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Understands Your Problems

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to help you if you were confined to bed.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Help If You Were Confined to Bed
synonyms: RSSS01-Help If You Were Confined to Bed

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to take you to the doctor if you needed it.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Take You to the Doctor If Needed
synonyms: RSSS01-Take You to the Doctor If Needed

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to prepare your meals if you were unable to do it yourself.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Prepare Your Meals If Unable

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to help with daily chores if you were sick.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Help With Daily Chores If Sick
synonyms: RSSS01-Help With Daily Chores If Sick

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone who shows you love and affection.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Shows You Love and Affection

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to love and make you feel wanted.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Love and Make You Feel Wanted
synonyms: RSSS01-Love and Make You Feel Wanted

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone who hugs you.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Hugs You

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to have a good time with.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Have a Good Time With

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to get together with for relaxation.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Get Together With for Relaxation

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to do something enjoyable with.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Do Something Enjoyable With

terms.definition: RAND Social Support Survey Instrument - How often is each of the following kinds of support available to you if you need it: Someone to do things with to help you get your mind off things.
terms.preferredTerm: RAND Social Support Survey - Help You Get Your Mind Off Things
synonyms: RSSS01-Help You Get Your Mind Off Things
